message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially even exceeding $1500000. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product just yet, I'm confident it could be a game-changer for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1750000. This is a price I'm comfortable with, but I'm open to negotiation if you have any concerns. Please let me know your thoughts.
